info.name: LinuxMint_Blog Deepdark
info.description:
Follow minty news in the dark. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (linuxmint blog dark theme)

This is a dark theme for http://blog.linuxmint.com/ inspired by FT DeepDark.

Also, credit where credit is due for the color palettes. (@KDE, @horst3180, @linuxmint, Firefox, YouTube and Discord)

Official GitHub page, with screenshots and colors, available here.
info.additionalInfo:

<p1 style="font-weight: bold;">Changelog:</p1>
1.0.5 .user.css for Stylus
1.0.4 search bar fix, border around images
1.0.3 added GNU license in the code, added ubuntu colors
1.0.2 added color palettes: black and white, yellow (x2), orange and Jisho 夜明け
1.0.1 new design themed
1.0.0 initial commit
